text: Zury Mayté Ríos Sosa (born 24 January 1968) is a Guatemalan politician. She is the daughter of the late general, and President of Guatemala Efraín Ríos Montt. From 2000 to 2004, she was the Second Vice President of the Congress of Guatemala. From 1996 to 2012, she was a member of Congress. Zury was the presidential candidate for the party VIVA at the 2015 elections and ran in the 2023 elections. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Guatemalan politicians Category:People from Guatemala City
title: Zury Ríos
